```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(boot)
library(readr)
library(knitr)
library(tibble)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
library(tidyr)
library(forcats)
library(here)
library(fixest)
library(modelsummary)

df <- readRDS(here("data", "processed", "air_quality_smooth.rds"))
```

```{r}
model <- feols(aqi ~ after_reform | sitename, data = df)

summary(model)
modelsummary(
  list("Model" = model), 
  stars = TRUE, 
  coef_omit = "factor", 
  output = "latex"
)
```
